meanings.definition: The sweet, dark purple fruit of a mulberry tree.
meanings.sent1: I picked some ripe mulberries from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed eating the juicy mulberries.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the park had a party with the fallen mulberries.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as dark and sweet as a bowl of mulberries.
meanings.sent5: The mulberries stained his fingers a deep purple color.

meanings.definition: A tree of the genus Morus, bearing this fruit.
meanings.sent1: The mulberries in our backyard provide shade in the summer.
meanings.sent2: We planted a mulberry tree in the garden last spring.
meanings.sent3: The birds built a nest on the branches of the mulberry.
meanings.sent4: The mulberry tree stood tall and proud in the orchard.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the mulberry rustled in the gentle breeze.
